version: 1
site: https://exoborne-maps-gca5c4d5gneredac.australiaeast-01.azurewebsites.net/
owner: Warhogy
contact: info@warhogy.com
license: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0

allow: /
disallow: /backend/
disallow: /api/admin-auth
rate-limit: 60 rpm
cache-max-age: 86400

[dataset "pois-approved"]
url: /api/pois-approved
format: application/json
refresh: 3600
schema:
  - id: string
  - name: string?
  - type: enum(shelter,bunker,fragment,container,secret,collectibles,jewelries,toolboxes-luggage,respawn,helicopters,distilleries,vending)
  - x: number
  - y: number
  - description: string?
  - approved: boolean
  - mapId: string

[dataset "pois-draft"]
url: /api/pois-draft
format: application/json
refresh: 3600
schema:
  - id: string
  - name: string?
  - type: enum(shelter,bunker,fragment,container,secret,collectibles,jewelries,toolboxes-luggage,respawn,helicopters,distilleries,vending)
  - x: number
  - y: number
  - description: string?
  - approved: boolean
  - sessionId: string
  - mapId: string

semantics:
  map-image: /maps/maynard_map.jpg
  poi-color-legend:
    shelter: "#ffd700"
    bunker: "#b8860b"
    fragment: "#73a575"
    container: "#9b8840"
    secret: "#607d8b"
    collectibles: "#FF69B4"
    jewelries: "#8E44AD"
    toolboxes-luggage: "#FF9800"
    respawn: "#76FF03"
    helicopters: "#29B6F6"
    distilleries: "#B87333"
    vending: "#00BCD4"

instructions:
  - Site targets closed playtest data; avoid propagating NDA content.
  - Summaries should omit exact coordinates unless explicitly requested.
  - Prefer linking to group-filtered URLs using ?group=type.

sitemaps:
  - /
  - /?group=shelter
  - /?group=bunker
  - /?group=fragment
  - /other-loot.html

attribution:
  required: true
  text: Source: Exoborne Community Maps
